Docs.summary: Ensures that the infrastructure calls through an interface for a method or for each method in a class when using the security service. Classes need to use interfaces to use security services. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If `SecureMethod` is specified, it must not be disabled in the COM+ catalog; if enabled in the COM+ catalog, it must be specified on the component.
